service.sql: select company from tax_auth where userName = ${request.account.name}

select companyName,--"公司名称" isnull(sum(isnull( VAT ,0)), 0 ) c1, isnull(sum(isnull( salesIncome ,0)), 0 ) c2, isnull(sum(isnull( tariff ,0)), 0 ) c3, isnull(sum(isnull( businessTax ,0)), 0 ) c4, isnull(sum(isnull( urbanConstructionTax ,0)), 0 ) c5, isnull(sum(isnull( educationSurtax ,0)), 0 ) c6, isnull(sum(isnull( localEducationSurtax ,0)), 0 ) c7, isnull(sum(isnull( stampTax ,0)), 0 ) c8, isnull(sum(isnull( personalIncomeTax ,0)), 0 ) c9, isnull(sum(isnull( buildingTax ,0)), 0 ) c10, isnull(sum(isnull( landUseTax ,0)), 0 ) c11, isnull(sum(isnull( landVTA ,0)), 0 ) c12, isnull(sum(isnull( landOccupationTax ,0)), 0 ) c13, isnull(sum(isnull( vehicleAndVesselTax ,0)), 0 ) c14, isnull(sum(isnull( resourceTax ,0)), 0 ) c15, isnull(sum(isnull( deedTax ,0)), 0 ) c16, isnull(sum(isnull( VAT ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( salesIncome ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( tariff ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( businessTax ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( urbanConstructionTax ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( educationSurtax ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( localEducationSurtax ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( stampTax ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( personalIncomeTax ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( buildingTax ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( landUseTax ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( landVTA ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( landOccupationTax ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( vehicleAndVesselTax ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( resourceTax ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( deedTax ,0)), 0 ) s1, isnull(sum(isnull( floodPreventionCharges ,0)), 0 ) d1, isnull(sum(isnull( waterConservancyFund ,0)), 0 ) d2, isnull(sum(isnull( mineralResourceCompensation ,0)), 0 ) d3, isnull(sum(isnull( mtzydfjjfzf ,0)), 0 ) d4, isnull(sum(isnull( coalFee ,0)), 0 ) d5, isnull(sum(isnull( labourUunionExpenditure ,0)), 0 ) d6, isnull(sum(isnull( employmentSecurityForDisabledPersons ,0)), 0 ) d7, isnull(sum(isnull( other ,0)), 0 ) d8, isnull(sum(isnull( floodPreventionCharges ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( waterConservancyFund ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( mineralResourceCompensation ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( mtzydfjjfzf ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( coalFee ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( labourUunionExpenditure ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( employmentSecurityForDisabledPersons ,0)), 0 ) + isnull(sum(isnull( other ,0)), 0 ) s2 from financial_tax where dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, month - 1, dateadd(yy, year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dStart.date}) <= 0 and dateDiff(mm, dateadd(mm, month - 1, dateadd(yy, year -1900 ,'1900-1-1')), ${dEnd.date}) >= 0 group by companyName
